name: Greeting Card
description:
Celebrate milestones big and small with the greeting card widget for FigJam. Pick from 6 card templates in up to 5 color variations, add a personalized message, and then invite others to add their own notes and images. Seal up the card for a special reveal when the recipient opens it.


Get started with the greeting card widget:

  1. Click “Install” at the top right of this page
  2. Open a FigJam file
  3. On the tool bar, click the button at the far right and search for “Greeting Card” 
  4. Select the greeting card widget to insert it into your document
  5. Select a card template and customize the color and message 
  6. Put the card in an envelope using the widget‘s property menu—this will also seal the envelope!
  7. Reveal the card by clicking on the tape to unseal the envelope


Get started with the greeting card widget: https://www.figma.com/community/file/1103765631350943674/
